name: World Submarine Combat
description:
Submarine Simulator 3D steel shark, underwater stealth killer
World War III has broken out in the Pacific and Atlantic waters and other major sailing look forward to our secret weapon, ready to launch a nuclear strike!
you can dirve chinese 09-IV JIN class type094 ,Russian Typhon,The Dolgorukiy class Borei-class Project 955 K-535 Yury Dolgorukiy,US Ohio Nuclear-powered ballistic missile submarine,UK Royal Navy SSBN Vanguard-class S28.
Japan Sōryū-class submarine(Soryu class)Diesel-powered attack submarine.
To build your own nuclear submarine base and a deadly arsenal of weapons.
fire Intercontinental strategic nuclear missiles
Hunting target,Blow up Anti-submarine helicopters ,cruiser

new mission
1.search russian sunken submarine Kursk (K-141)
2. Drive North Korea's missile submarine launched a surprise attack on the world!
